Top 7 Best Tig Welders Picks with Reviews

Our top 7 best TIG welders under 2000$ have made to this list after a lot of in-depth research of their features and customer reviews.

We came to find out by the end of our research that these TIG welders are putting a smile on many satisfied customer’s faces. If your love for welding is immense then we are sure you are going to find your perfect TIG welder under 2000$ by the end of this article.

Undoubtedly, nothing makes us happy than helping our readers guide and find the most versatile product at a very cheap rate without compromising the quality.

Quality and economic feasibility is our ultimate priority while looking for these amazing products. Importantly, let’s dig into details of each unit now. Check it out if you’re looking for Best Cheap Tig Welders.

Here’s a list of top 7 best Tig welders with reviews and guide:

Best overall

ESAB EMP215IC

Specifications:

  • Voltage: Dual voltage (130/230V)
  • Amperage capacity: 250 amps
  • Weight: 79.2 pounds
  • Dimensions: 17.68 x 7.8 x 13.66 inches
  • Duty cycles: 20%
  • Works best on: steel construction
  • Material: Aluminum
  • Welding type: MIG, Flux-Cored, Stick and Lift TIG welding
Check On Amazon

The Rebel EMP 215ic offers flexibility and functionality. As a result, it is one of the most innovative welding technology available under 2000$.

A design inspired by professional welders, the Rebel EMP 215ic is a complete MIG/TIG/Stick package ready to weld anything from mild steel to aluminum to stainless steel.

It is easy to carry and ready to go anywhere. You can take it anywhere with you it is that easy to carry. You will certainly get true multi-process performance for best-in-class MIG, Flux-Cored, Stick, including 6010 Stick electrodes, and Lift TIG welding with Rebel EMP 215ic under 2000$.

The cost of this unit is really reasonable and economical as compared to the features it offers. Smart MIG feature also increases productivity for the experienced welder and reduces training time for novice welders.

The innovative display has larger display screen and higher pixel density to provide a more clear view of the TFT screen than other light industrial welders; loaded with exclusive features: on-demand availability of the user’s manual, listing of spare parts – all in multiple languages

The design of this product is very unique (five-handle roll cage industrial design). The single body steel construction in a lightweight makes it a highly portable unit.

It comes with a 3-year warranty. Furthermore, Rebel Series models come ready to weld out of the box.

Pros
  • Multi-process unit
  • MIG/TIG/Stick/ Flux cord welding
  • Adapts to operator’s welding skills
  • Highly durable and portable
  • Good for newcomers
  • Larger display screen
Cons
  • Shielding gas not included

Why do we recommend this model?

This model is the most versatile model under 2000$ because it is used for all types of welding techniques including MIG, TIG, Stick, flux cord, etc. Plus it works efficiently on all types of welding materials. The features provided by this unit surely make it a top priority in our list of best TIG welders under 2000$.

Premium Choice

Miller Maxstar 150 STL

Specifications:

  • Voltage: input voltage 150/230V
  • Weight: 13.7 pounds
  • Dimensions: 13.25 x 5.5 x 9 inches; 0.01 Ounces
  • Duty cycles: 100%
  • Works best on: steel, material thickness mild steel: 0.020″ to 3/16″
  • Material: Metal
  • Welding type: TIG and Stick welding
Check On Amazon

The Miller 150 STL is one of the most versatile TIG welders currently on the market.  It offers both TIG and stick welding capabilities as well as a number of features that make it highly portable. 

It weighs just under 14lbs, has a handy carry strap, and even has a multi-voltage plug for quickly switching between 120V and 240V power sources.

For TIG welding applications its amperage range is between 5-150A.  It offers a 100% duty cycle at 100A and a 30% duty cycle at 150A. Millers Lite-Arc technology allows for TIG arc initiation without the use of high frequency.

For lightweight TIG welding the Miller Maxstar 150 STL is a great machine.  At lower amperage it’s got a great duty cycle, though it drops significantly at higher outputs. 

If you need a TIG welder that is both reliable and portable this one is tough to beat.

Pros
  • Great duty cycles at lower amperage capacity
  • Portable and durable
  • Light in weight
  • TIG/Stick welding
  • Versatile
Cons
  • Poor duty cycles at higher amperage capacity

Why we recommend this model?

This might be the best TIG welder under 2000$ which offers great duty cycles at lower amperage. So if your tasks to be performed fall under these criteria then this product is highly recommended.

Best Everlast

Everlast PowerMTS211Si

Specifications:

  • Voltage: Dual voltage ( 120/220 V)
  • Amperage capacity: 200 Amp
  • Weight: 80 pounds
  • Dimensions: 27.5 x 19.5 x 16 inches
  • Duty cycles: 60%
  • Works best on: sheet metal and up to about 1/4″ to 3/8″ steel
  • Material: Stainless steel
  • Welding type: MIG, TIG and Stick welding
Check On Amazon

Subsequently, with the Everlast PowerMTS 211SI , MIG TIG Stick 200  device you are moving more into the serious welding zone. Most importantly, this digitally operated machine is so versatile that it can be converted for different welding processes.

Similarly, this kind of welder can be changed into a stick welder, a spool welder, a MIG and a power TIG and any other welder type you want. Consequently, if you are looking for a multi-process model under 2000$ then is the cheapest option for you among our list of best TIG welder under 2000$.

Everlast is a 3 in 1 device, which has won the heart of every welder. However, those who want to buy a less costly device, which can be used for different welding techniques according to the task needed to be performed.

Briefly, this can do more things than the other devices available in the market. Hence, Everlast MTS 211Si is very economical for the versatile services it is providing.

On the other hand,  the device can seem difficult to understand at first time, but with it will be easier for you to understand.

Pros
  • Dual voltage
  • Multi- method welder
  • Digitally operated machine

  • User friendly

Welder’s Choice

Hobart EZ-TIG 165i

Specifications:

  • Voltage: 230 V
  • Amperage capacity: 25-190 Amps
  • Weight: 60 pounds
  • Dimensions: 9.87” W x 23.87” L x 17”
  • Duty cycles: 20%
  • Works best on: aluminum, steel, stainless steel and chrome-moly
  • Material: Metal
  • Welding type: TIG welding
Check On Amazon

If you’re looking for a TIG welder, indeed one of the best units available in the market is the Hobart EZ-TIG 165i. Definitely, it is an outstanding performer for both amateurs who are willing to learn the art of TIG welding and professionals who are already expert in this field.

Additionally, it is easy to set up and use. Subsequently, one can weld anything from stainless steel to aluminum with this unit. Also it offers infinite adjustments to set up the unit as per your exact specifications and requirements.

Moreover, It is a reliable, durable AC/DC TIG welder that is quick and easy-to-setup. Welds up to 3/16″ material and operates on 230V input power with up to 165 amps of output.

To sum up, everyone appreciates simplicity, no matter if you’re a newbie or an expert welder. Hence, you will be happy to know that this Hobart welder was designed while keeping simplicity in mind.

Also, it offers a simple interface that gives 3 options like: Power: On/Off switch, Amperage/Thickness knob.

In this case, you just need to set the thickness of the material and based on the thickness of materials the unit will adjust amperage itself.

The EZ-TIG 165i offers high-frequency start. The high frequency start is of benefit because since there’s no contact between tungsten and material, as a result it is helping to eliminate contamination in the area.

Moreover, another function which ensures this unit’s position in amazing TIG welders under 2000$ is its fan-on-demand feature. In particular, this technology works by turning on the fan only when it is. Hence, the benefit of this is that it reduces energy costs and the amount of noise in the workshop.

Apart from this, it prolongs the life of the machine.

Pros
  • High-frequency start
  • Simple design
  • AC/DC TIG welder
  • Auto amperage adjustment
  • Fan-on-Demand
Cons
  • Low duty cycles

Why do we recommend this model?

This model surely deserves to be in the list of our best TIG welders under 2000$ because of the features it provides. During our research we found out how many smiles this welder is putting on customer’s faces and we think if this welder falls in your requirements criteria then you should not miss out.

High Quality Tig

AHP AlphaTIG 200X

Specifications:

  • Voltage: 110/120 V
  • Amperage capacity: 200 Amps
  • Weight: 69 pounds
  • Dimensions: 19 x 23 x 12 inches
  • Duty cycles: 60%
  • Works best on: aluminum, stainless steel and precise welding of thinner-gauage materials
  • Material: Metal
  • Welding type: TIG and Stick welding
Check On Amazon

The AlphaTIG 200X is a welding machine that can operate in TIG or stick welding mode. Furthermore, the AlphaTIG is designed to operate on either 110 or 220 Volt in single phase. Depending on your welding job you can either select AC or DC output current.

We noticed that the pulse of the AlphaTIG 200X can be used in both DC and AC modes and offer a good range of frequency control. As you may know, other welding machines have a fixed pulse speed and can’t be easily adjusted.

According to the manufacturer, in unfavorable situations like being outside in windy conditions, the AlphaTIG 200X welding machine makes welding easy with its versatility in power.

The pre and post flow control and start and end cycles are programmable features.  In addition, the 2T/4T sequencer function can be switched via a remote.

A fully adjustable pulse feature helps to control the heat by adjusting pulse frequency, base and peak welding amps, and between low and high amp stages division of time.

One thing we like is that the 2T/4T switch lets you choose between two touch (2T) or four touch (4T) operation. But take care the foot pedal will only work in the 2T mode.

Pros
  • High-quality weld
  • Versatile
  • Gives control over welding
  • Operates on both AC/DC
  • TIG and Stick welder
Cons
  • Slightly expensive
Check Price on Amazon
Best Portable Tig

Lincoln k5126-1

Specifications:

  • Voltage: Dual voltage ( 120/240)
  • Amperage capacity: 200 Amp
  • Weight: 73 pounds
  • Dimensions: 22 x 13.1 x 21 inches
  • Duty cycles: 20%
  • Works best on: A great TIG machine for aluminum
  • Material: Metal
  • Welding type: TIG/Stick welding
Check On Amazon

Lincoln k-5126-1 is a portable TIG and Stick welding machine that lets professionals, hobbyists, makers, small fabricators and craftsmen explore their creativity.

It is commonly known as square wave TIG welder. You can take it anywhere and plug it anywhere.  It is designed to help you expand your welding skills. As your skills mature and confidence grow you can take advantage of this model’s additional functionality.

Your skill level does not matter. Once you buy this bad boy you would not be disappointed at any cost. Lincoln k-5126-1 provides smooth and quality welding on aluminum, stainless steel and chrome-moly. The user friendly interface makes it very easy to setup the welder.

Furthermore, the available features such as pulse, which provide a drumbeat like a rhythm for filter metal deposition, make you become a better TIG welder faster.

It is a great TIG machine under 2000$ for aluminum also. For a fine weld bead because AC frequency control is easy to adjust for the users. Subsequently, adjustable AC provides more cleaning action on aluminum.

Another benefit which Lincoln k-5126-1 under 2000$ provide is one power source for TIG and Stick welding. Altogether the multi-process machine can TIG weld efficiently when precision and bead appearance is needed.

In addition, this versatile TIG welder also gives the advantage of Stick welding capability for outdoor work or thick materials.

Also, the accessories included with this easy to use unit are foot Amptrol, Gas flow regulator/flow meter, gas hose kit, 200A stick electrode holder, ground clamp and cable and lastly, 120 and 230V input cords.

Pros
  • Easy to use and carry
  • Best available for hobbyists
  • Smooth and quality welding
  • Filter metal deposition
  • Multi-process unit
  • Included accessories save money and time
Cons
  • Only suitable for light tasks

Why do we recommend this model?

We recommend this unit because it is the best TIG welder under 2000$ beginners, hobbyists, and newcomers. It lets you enhance your own skills. You can carry it anywhere and plug it anywhere. It has advanced features yet it is simple and easy to use. It is a user friendly unit under 2000$ we must say.

The Everlast Power TIG, however, is the option available for you it creates a balance between performance and budget.

Undoubtedly, the Everlast brand is new in the market, but in such a less time they’ve been popular in the welding market. The Everlast has  a simple, yet versatile design that will meet all of your your welding requirements.

In addition, it is a dual voltage welder. Also, the Everlast offers a variety of desirable features that any professional welder would want in an economical budget. Furthermore, it comes as ready to use right out of the box.

The Everlast is a multi- functional TIG it can deal with a variety of welding processes. Like, it is suitable for both a seasoned welder and a professional welder.

Similarly, this machine is simple and easy to use and provides color-coded controls for easy identifications and understandings. Hence, it’s the best unit for beginners who are looking for an easy to use welder.

This unit comes with both AC and DC capabilities. It has dual voltage as mentioned previously. Also, This unit has an impressive amperage capacity. Likewise, this TIG welder will help you achieve greater heat control as well as a greater arc definition.

FAQ’s

Before buying a TIG welder check out all of the features of the product you are considering to buy and if they meet you requirements. After that, read our article on to choose among top most rated and reviewed products. Keep your budget in mind while buying a welder for you. We have picked economical welders under 2000$

All of the above mentioned top rated TIG welders under 2000$ are the exact kind of TIG welders you need for aluminum. Always consider your budget first then voltage and amperage capacity as per your material thickness. Keep duty cycles in mind as well.  To be more specific, a TIG -tungsten inert gas welder is more suitable for aluminum than MIG welders.

We understand your pain. Working with TIG welders can be expensive but we are dedicated to provide you with all of the information you need while buying a cheap TIG welder without compromising on the quality and best TIG welders under 2000$ is one of that article. You just have to do a little search and after that you will find amazing welders providing quality welding at a cheap cost a lot better than the expensive welders.

When it comes to reliable welding equipment Miller is one of the best names in the business. They make all of their equipment using only top quality components.

They don’t compromise that quality at any cost. As a result of this miller products are quite expensive. Indeed, you will find no more reliable products than ones Miller offers.  They set the standard high in the welding business.
